description: BOOMAX is a Bluetooth V4.0 compliant, low energy Bluetooth speaker with incredibly big clear sound and bass. It is compatible with most cell phones, tablets, PCs/laptops and most devices with built-in Bluetooth. An AUX-in jack and a cable is available to ensure its compatibility with some other devices without Bluetooth. BOOMAX comes with output power 3Wx2, its classic shape matches well with the anodized aluminum-alloy body. The detachable handle makes it easy to carry for outdoor use, not just an indoor piece. With built-in microphone, it can be used as a portable speaker phone, suitable for hand free talking. The built-in battery can support up to 22 hours talk time and 10-12 hours continuous music play. It only measures 106(L)×50(W)×92(H)mm, compact in size but with great CD like music quality (i.e. aptX music supported).
title: Mipow BOOMAX Speakers - Silver
